game.name: Aqua Panic !
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: After a violent tropical cyclone, the fish, shrimp, octopuses and other sea creatures find themselves flung out of the water… There's not a minute to lose! Use original tools to guide them to freedom! You'll need to think hard and act fast to save them all!
game.shortDescriptionEn: After a violent tropical cyclone, the fish, shrimp, octopuses and other sea creatures find themselves flung out of the water… There's not a minute to lose! Use original tools to guide them to freedom! You'll need to think hard and act fast to save them all!

reviewHighlights.text: The idea of this game is good. It's a Lemmings type of puzzle game where you have to save a number of fish each level using a variety of tools. There...
